widgets_values: Upscale image 1. Use the poster from image 2 as a reference to fix the text.

nodes.title: Describe the Aesthetic
widgets_values: minimalist in a clean neutral toned environment

nodes.title: Prompt Template
widgets_values:
Create a 2x2 grid composition featuring four distinct, high-quality mockups. Populate each of the four panels by integrating the poster shown in image 1 (maintain the input posters aspect ratio) into various {type}.

The entire grid must strictly adhere to a {aesthetic} aesthetic.

Apply coordinated {lighting} across all four scenarios to ensure visual consistency. Ensure the scenes in each panel are varied use-cases and look authentic to the chosen medium.
